definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The result indicated that there was flavonoid in the body of silkworm.
sentences.chinese: 此结果表明家蚕体中含有黄酮类化合物。

sentences.english: The recombinant virus was used to infect silkworm larvae.
sentences.chinese: 共转染获得重组病毒用于感染家蚕。

sentences.english: The Choice of Parents for Crossing in Bombyx mori L.
sentences.chinese: 家蚕杂交组合亲本选配方法研究进展。

sentences.english: Therefore it is inferred that the fragment was from the W chromosome of Bombyx.
sentences.chinese: 从而初步推断该分子标记来自于家蚕的W染色体。

sentences.english: Enterococcus was the natural flora comes from enteron of silkworm.
sentences.chinese: 肠球菌是家蚕消化道中的一种正常菌群。

sentences.english: At present, pebrine influence seriously on the egg-production of silkworm.
sentences.chinese: 目前家蚕微粒子病对蚕种生产造成很大影响。

sentences.english: The defense response of hemocytes in the silkworm, Bombyx mori to Beauveria bassiana was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了家蚕血细胞对病原白僵菌的防御反应。

sentences.english: And they also have the effect to slow down the growth of silkworms' weight.
sentences.chinese: 对家蚕的体重增长也具有明显的减缓作用。

sentences.english: Screening of Molecular Markers for NPV Resistance in Bombyx mori L.
sentences.chinese: 家蚕抗核型多角体病分子标记筛选。

sentences.english: And it is important of silkworm variety certification.
sentences.chinese: 同时也阐明了家蚕品种鉴定工作的重要性。

sentences.english: Also called "silkworm (bombyx mori), " silkworm moths division.
Silkworm germplasm resources are the bases to develop sericulture.
sentences.chinese: 家蚕种质资源是改进养蚕业和丝绸业的物质基础。

definition: imago (adult, sexually mature insect, the final stage of its development)
(of spiders, caterpillars, silkworms etc) to extrude silk
